snippet: A detainee facing a death penalty trial complained of torture instead of answering a judge’s question.
abstract: Military judge Col James L Pohl twice expels Ramzi bin al-Shibh--one of five Guantanamo Bay detainees facing death penalty trial in 9/11 case--from courtroom at military base there after he disrupted proceedings by shouting about his treatment.
lead_paragraph: A detainee facing a death penalty trial complained of torture instead of answering a judge’s question.

headline.main: Suspect in 9/11 Case Is Ejected From a Guantánamo Court After Outbursts
headline.print_headline: Suspect in 9/11 Case Is Ejected From a Guantánamo Court After Outbursts

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
